version_description: Hello Yo is supporting Thai and Bahasa Indonesia. Welcome to download to experience it and we are looking forward to your feedback.

1. The new function 'Friend Search' is added.
2. The room owner can play the music in the room.
3. UI pages are optimized with more attractive design.

1. Newly added "The Beginner's Guide"
2. Support to share to LINE, WhatsApp, Instagram
3. Room theme and room audience number can be displayed in homepage list
Welcome to download and experience Hello Yo!

1、Experience the voice call and video chat with your friends for free and there’s no time limit!
2、Bugfix

Major revision, update it at your earliest!
1. Brand New UI
2. Fantastic Hot Section
3. Newly-added Fan List
4. Interesting Activity Center
5. Newly-added Poker Games

1、You can receive your friends' message without opening Hello Yo!
2、Newly added a lot of emotion expression.
3、You can decorate in your room with long-click on Mic .

1、You can receive your friends' message without opening Hello Yo!
2、Newly added a lot of emotion expression.
3、You can decorate in your room with long-click on Mic .

1. You can use movable People's Magic towards others in the room.
2. The Room-entry Special Effect is open to buy in the store, buy it you can also get stunning public screen bubbles.
3. Newly launched online Rankings, come and see your Rankings!
4. Newly launched My Achievement Value. The higher the achievement value is, the higher your status is in Hello Yo.
